rooms.description: This space serves as the welcoming area with large windows to allow natural light and ventilation. It aligns with Vastu principles for positive energy flow.

An open-plan space combining the kitchen and living area to promote family interaction, ensuring natural light enters through skylights and large windows. Vastu guidelines ensure the entrance faces an auspicious direction.
A dedicated home theater that can serve as a multipurpose space for entertainment, with soundproofing measures and integrated seating. It is designed to capture natural light without glare.
A guest bedroom optimized for ventilation and sunlight, following Vastu for restful energy.
The main bedroom is designed with ample storage, large windows to maximize natural light, and a private balcony for relaxation.
An open family room that can be used as an additional living space or work area. It includes built-in storage and integrates natural ventilation.
